title: the league of legends download hates me!
body: so ive been trying to download league of legends for like 5-6 days now and every time it downloads at like 20 kbps. (ive tried everything posted on the forums with no success.) but every once in a while the game downloads at like 100-300 kbps so I wait for it and at that point every time it gets to 50% it crashes and I have to restart at 0%, I have tried uninstalling and redownloading the installer, ive tried turning my firewall of and I even did an entire hard drive wipe and after, still no change. I just want to play the game.

replies.body:
Patching issues at this point in the process are usually caused by the patcher not being able to maintain a good connection to the patching servers. Most of the time, this is caused by local network settings that conflict with the patcher, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this is not the case.

Let me know if this continues to happen after those changes.
